price: Àwọn ará orí ògiri gàgá yóò pe àwọn ènìyàn kan tí wọ́n mọ̀ wọ́n pẹ̀lú àmì wọn, wọn yó sì sọ pé: “Ohun tí ẹ kójọ nílé ayé àti ṣíṣe ìgbéraga yín sí ìgbàgbọ́ òdodo kò rọ̀ yín lọ́rọ̀ mọ́ (báyìí).”
arabic: وَنَادَىٰٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَعۡرَافِ رِجَالٗا يَعۡرِفُونَهُم بِسِيمَىٰهُمۡ قَالُواْ مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنكُمۡ جَمۡعُكُمۡ وَمَا كُنتُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wanādā aṣḥābu al-aʿrāfi rijālan yaʿrifūnahum bisīmāhum qālū mā aghnā ʿankum jamʿukum wamā kuntum tastakbirūna
